title: Self-Worth & Shame
subtitle: Healing the wound beneath all wounds
description: Shame is often the hidden driver of our struggles. This course helps you recognize shame, understand its origins, differentiate toxic from healthy shame, and rebuild genuine self-worth from the inside out.

modules.title: Understanding Shame
modules.description: What shame is and how it differs from guilt

modules.title: Where Your Shame Comes From
modules.description: How shame is learned and internalized

modules.title: Recognizing Shame Patterns
modules.description: How shame shows up in your life

modules.title: Building Genuine Self-Worth
modules.description: From external validation to internal ground

whatYouLearn: Understand what shame is and how it differs from guilt
Recognize how shame shows up in your patterns
Work with shame at the nervous system level

questions.question: What is the difference between shame and guilt?
options: Guilt says 'I did something bad'; shame says 'I am bad'

questions.question: How is shame typically learned?
options: Through experiences of rejection, humiliation, or conditional acceptance in childhood

questions.question: How does shame show up in the body?
options: Collapsing, wanting to hide, heat/flushing, frozen feeling

questions.question: What helps heal shame?
options: Compassionate witnessing, both internal and with safe others

questions.question: What is the foundation of genuine self-worth?
options: An internal relationship with yourself based on inherent value, not performance
